Goblin_002.synopsis: One goblin announced the blade of frontiers has no change against the Absolute!

Goblin_003.synopsis: Drunken goblin isn't scared of that famous hero the Blade of Frontiers!

Goblin_001.synopsis: Goblin talking about that chump hero the Blade of Frontiers
Goblin_001.how_to_trigger: - loadlevel WLD_Main_A - goto 247.23; 40.947; 25.989- Talk to Warrior Plagg

Goblin_002_0.speaker: Sharp-Eye Crub
Goblin_002_0.text: You're either with the Absolute or against her. Ain't no in-between.

Goblin_002_1.speaker: Sharp-Eye Crub
Goblin_002_1.text: Nowhere the faithless can hide. It's the Absolute's world now!

Goblin_003_0.speaker: Tracker Nik-Nuk
Goblin_003_0.text: Heh. Boss Ragzlin weren't lying when he said anyone could join the Absolute's ranks.

Goblin_003_1.speaker: Tracker Nik-Nuk
Goblin_003_1.text: Ragzlin says to clobber some skulls, you better be ready to clobber some skulls.

Goblin_001_0.speaker: Warrior Plagg
Goblin_001_0.text: Keep moving, 'less you're wanting a clubbing and drubbing.

Goblin_001_1.speaker: Warrior Plagg
Goblin_001_1.text: Make a wrong move, and Boss Ragzlin'll chew you up and spit out the chunks!
